entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
